consecutive punches.log: unleashed a rapid flurry of strikes!

headbutt.log: smashed their forehead into the opponent!

spinning kick.log: spun rapidly and delivered a crushing kick!

parry.log: set up a perfect parry stance!

suplex.log: lifted and slammed the opponent overhead!

double leg takedown.log: dived low for a powerful takedown!

arm bar.log: locked the opponent's arm in a painful submission!

wrist lock.log: twisted the opponent's wrist with precision!

eye jab.log: poked the opponent's eyes, blinding them!

wall kick.log: leaped off the wall for a flying strike!

counter punch.log: waited for an opening and countered!

stun lock.log: delivered a precise blow to freeze the opponent!

neck snap.log: attempted a lethal neck snap maneuver!

dragon strike.log: channeled spiritual energy into a devastating palm!

shadow fist.log: delivered a strike so fast it left a blur!

iron body.log: hardened their muscles to negate damage!

time skip.log: manipulated the flow of time to strike again!

berserker rush.log: went into a blind rage, pummeling the opponent!

perfect kill.log: focused everything into a single, lethal blow!

backfist.log: whipped around with a sudden backfist!

hook.log: swung a vicious hook to the jaw!

palm strike.log: drove their palm into the opponent's chest!

front kick.log: delivered a forceful snap kick to the stomach!

knee strike.log: drove a hard knee into the opponent's ribs!

axe kick.log: brought their heel down like a falling axe!

choke hold.log: applied a tight grip around the neck!

body slam.log: picked up the opponent and slammed them down!

pressure point strike.log: tapped a vital nerve to paralyze the foe!

backflip kick.log: flipped backward while kicking the opponent's chin!

limit break.log: surpassed their limits for a massive assault!
